text:
ğŸ’The short but interesting Rambutan Trail located near the Main entrance of Thomson Nature Park routes around the former Rambutan Plantation.
ğŸ’Along the trail, vistors are treated to the ruins of the former villagers residences, with information boards to their stories and the several fruit trees around.
ğŸ’A former Rambutan Plantation's water source can also be found at the trail.
ğŸ’Don't miss out on this tranquil and shady trail when visiting the Nature Park.
